body.name: Lumbar Support Pillow for Office Chair - Improve Back Pain, Posture While Sitting - Memory Foam Cushion with Adjustable Strap for Desk/Gaming Chair, Car, Couch, Recliner
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 23 mins
features: Relieves Backache and Fatigue After Long Sitting Hours: Our lumbar support pillow is anatomically shaped to contour to the natural curve of your spine, giving you more support than ordinary back cushions. it supports the upper, middle, and lower back to effectively reduce compression for hours of sitting comfort

The specially contoured design of our back support pillow has extended sides that hug your back and a gentle curve that nestles in the vulnerable lumbar space. Helps you avoid slouching that causes back pain so you can work or drive without discomfort and stand up from your desk without the usual stiffness

Our chair back support crafted with heat responsive technology adapts itself to your contours to give you custom comfort the minute you sit back. You’ll enjoy tailored support you just can’t get from hard foam lumbar cushions

Made with proprietary memory foam formula, the lumbar support pillow for office chair provides the ideal amount of support and padding necessary to reduce pressure in your back; cushioning that oftentimes your current computer chair lacks
Our back support pillow for chair has dual adjustable straps for secure placement on a variety of chairs. Fits chair backs up to 32" (81cm) wide with included strap extensions
Takes soothing comfort to office chairs, cars, airplane seats and wheelchairs. Use it as a lumbar support pillow for car, back pillow for office chair, gaming chair pillow, and back pillow for travel

Retains Its Original Shape and Support: Our back support for office chair won’t flatten out, providing consistent comfort with its slow rebounding memory foam. You’ll experience pain relieving support use after use
Ventilated 3D Polyester Mesh Cover fabric of the lumbar cushion invites air to discourage perspiration, so you stay comfortably cool and dry, even when using for hours on end
Washable Cover: When the back support cushion needs refreshing, remove the breathable mesh cover, wash on gentle cycle, and tumble dry

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High-Density Memory Foam Our lumbar support pillow is made of high-density memory foam and contains no fillers or additives. It perfectly conforms to your spine and firmly hugs your back and lumbar as you lean back, providing excellent lumbar and back support while also providing ultimate comfort. Breathable Mesh Cover Our lumbar support pillow also has a breathable mesh cover for maximum comfort, which greatly improves heat dissipation and allows you to avoid back stuffiness and sweat even during long periods of sedentary activity, keeping you cool at all times. Machine Washable Our pillow cover is removable and machine washable, which allows you to perform better daily cleaning and maintenance by simply unzipping the cover and throwing it in the wash! Wash it on a gentle cycle and dry it on low or no heat. Do not clean the memory foam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's thick and manages the perfect balance of providing lower back support while also being cushy. I liked that the straps have elasticity to make it easier to attach to the chair and it stays in place. I bought it for a work chair where I sit far too many hours and this has really made a difference in how I feel at the end of the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received my lumbar support cushion today and I have to say that it is so comfortable and supportive. Right now I am using it for couch sitting and I just ordered a second one for my car. I have a L5 S1 problem. The pain can be very annoying and bring me to tears especially when driving. I am looking forward to the arrival of my second order arriving now. I do highly recommend this lumbar support!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This pillow provides good support and is made with memory firm. The straps are made of material that stretch very easily to fit any size chair. I have a larger size desk chair and was concerned that they wouldn't be able to wrap all the way around, but they easily do. The pillow seems to stay in place well, but you can also easily slide it up or down for more lower or higher support. My only dissatisfaction with it is that it's around an inch too thick in my opinion. It looks like most lumbar support pillows for chairs are around 4-5 inches thick. But it almost feels like it's pushing me out of the chair. Maybe it's just that I'm not used to it, but I would rather have a pillow that provides support, but doesn't make me feel unwelcome in my chair. Perhaps I'll get used to it over time. I will say, however, this thing will force you to sit up straight. So if you're not ready to commit to that, it's not for you. I would say FOR THE PRICE, it's definitely worth it, but if it were over $20, I'd go for something better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much relief
reviews.reviewText: I sleep in a raised recliner because of my back. As time wore on, even that became painful. I cannot stress enough how much this “pillow” is helping me. My back even feels better during the day. One minor item - the strap is not long enough to span the recliner but the pillow stays put anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Huge! Too big!
reviews.reviewText: I'm 6' tall and need lumbar support for back pain, but this thing is just way to big and thick. It could work for someone 7' tall, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This support pillow is GREAT! I have pain in my back and need extra support sitting (and standing - too bad I can't use for that)Anyway - I think it gives me comfort while sitting and would highly recommend to someone suffering with back problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lumbar support pillow
reviews.reviewText: This lumbar support pillow was very comfortable and it did the job has two adjustable sturdy straps to mount against your chair
This back support sits in just the right place in the curve of your lower back. The memory foam makes its super soft, while being very supportive. Highly recommend, five stars.
